fulltext:
Nguyen Vu Quoc Tu
QUALITY CONTROL
WORK EXPERIENCE
LARION / BESTARION
Jun 2018 - Present
Quality Control - Project Meperia Strategic Supply Sourcing (Development)
+ Main responsibilities: 
- Main Quality Control in the team, test on the third-party website about
selling hospital supplement.
- Write and design test case, making a formal document for testcase,
get the document approved by the Scrum Master or QC lead. 
- Following many processes of company and project (Release process,
hotfix process, log bug process,..etc). 
- Expertise in MS Office (Excel, Word, Powerpoint), Open Office.
- Attend and Presentation new feature of the development team to
another team of project. 
- Handle Issue of the for offshore customer report. 
- Attend all Agile Scrum Course, Quality Control Mindset Course. 
+ Achievements and skills gained:  
- Be assessed positively by Project Owner, Scrum Master, and Co-
Worker: active, honest, good speaking. 
- Observe, learn and extremely adaptable when working. 
- Improve English Communication Skill, Influencing skills, Working under
pressure, 
Interpersonal 
skills, 
Honest, 
Problem 
Solving, 
Time
Management, 
Outgoing 
skill, Work 
ethic, Teaching/training skills,
Creativity. 
Transcosmos Technologic Arts
Jun 2017 - Jun 2018
Quality Control - Project DECTECH (Chatbot)
+ Main responsibilities:
- Main Quality Control in the team, test on Mobile LINE chat application
and administrator of chatbot website.
- Document guideline for end-user.
- Meeting with the offshore customer every week.
- Create Data business flow with a scenario base on some random topic
(Introduce HCMC, Sales Store AI,..v,.v).
- Write and design test case, making a formal document for testcase.
- Write and design a test report for the customer.
+ Achievements and skills gained: 
- Be assessed positively by the Project Manager and Co-worker: active,
extremely adaptable...
- Passed ISTQB® Certified Tester (2018).
Individual Systems (IVS)
Apr 2016 - Aug 2016
Intership Quality Control - Project DOWA
+ Main responsibilities:
- Write a report for each activity every day.
- Learn how to write the test case, basic testing knowledge.
- Learn WaterFalls modern working style.
- Attend Japanese Course in the Company.
+ Recognition and Gains:

uyenvuquoctu
OBJECTIVE
Junior quality control
professional with nearly 2 years
of effectively monitoring a
variety of products for efficiency,
safety, and optimal
performance. Vigilant overseer
with a skilled understanding of
product examination to catch
defects and imperfections such
as cuts, scratches, folds, and
missing components. My goal is
trying to become Manager
about the resource for projects.

Hosting Event

Photograph

Presentation

INTERESTS

Social Activities
Soccer, Swimming
Streaming game
Music

Jul 2014 - Mar 2016
FPT - Greenwitch
Mar 2016 - Jan 2019
Major: Programming
GPA: 3.0/4 - Distinction Grade, Good conduct.
Member of Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union.
Major: E-Commerce and Marketing
GPA: 2.0/4 - Distinction Grade, Good conduct.
Used to be a member of Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union.
EDUCATION
LARION / BESTARION - Hosting event / MC
Jun 2018 - Present
Transcosmos Technologic Arts - Hosting event
Sep 2017 - Jun 2018
Member of planning event team of project
- Organize events for the trip, plan schedule, invites project member to
do some activities at the party.
- Guide and follow up all activities on the trip.
- Photograph for the project.
- Send special notification, party invitation to all members in the project.
- Hosting team building every month.
Member of planning event team beside with HR
- Organize events for the trip, plan schedule, invites company member to
do some activities at the party.
- Guide and follow up all activities on the trip.
- Photograph for the company.
- Be an mc of the project.
ACTIVITIES
FPT Aptech Scholarship in 2nd, 3rd semester 2014
- 2015 and 2st semester 2015 - 2016.
2014 - 2016

Finished First Course Ceritificate in Wall Street English

ISTQB® Certified Tester

Pragmatic Scrum Course
2018

- Able to listen, Public speaking, Teamwork, Time management,
Computer skills.
Do Ngoc Luu
Leader of DECTECH (Transcosmos Technologic Arts)
Email: luudn@tactv.com
Mobile: 097 345 2067
REFERENCES
Doan Hong Van
HR manager at LARION
Email: vandh@larion.com
Mobile: 090 298 4483
